title: Ta-Nehisi Coates Criticizes Calls For Nonviolence In Baltimore
teaser: NPR's Robert Siegel speaks with Ta-Nehisi Coates, a national correspondent for The Atlantic, about his reactions to the Baltimore riots. He wrote a story this week about the cons of nonviolence.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
